trans-unit.source: Models a Category, which consists of a localized name and a collection of properties.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry"></xref> class.
The localized Category name of a group of properties.
name is `empty`.
Sets a new property filter.
If the Category matches the specified filter, then the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.FilterApplied> event is raised.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> being applied.
Gets the name of the localized Category.
The localized Category name.
Declares the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> event.
Returns a property instance of this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry"></xref> object given the property name.
The string property name for which to return a property instance.
The property corresponding to the property name parameter if one exists; otherwise, `null`.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry"></xref> matches a filter.
`true` if a filter equals the specified filter; otherwise, `false`.
Indicates whether an <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> matches a predicate.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilterPredicate"></xref>, a string, to match against.
`true` if there is a match; otherwise, `false`.
Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.FilterApplied"></xref> event when the property filter is applied.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> being applied.
Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEntry.PropertyChanged"></xref> event.
The name of the property that is changed.
propertyName is `null`.
Gets an <xref href="Systems.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> collection of all of the properties in the category.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1"></xref>, a collection of all the properties in the category.
Declares the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Design.PropertyEditing.INotifyPropertyChanged"></xref> event.
